resources.string: Если вам нужен русский\n просто поменяйте язык в телефоне
Hello everyone! \n my name is Kostia \n I am looking for a job in Moscow

For 4 years I worked as an engineer-calculator at the state plant. I performed calculations for strength, created technical documentation. Cooperated with employees of neighboring departments and units.\n\n

Since September of this year I have been online learning on the site javarush.ru, now I finish the course javacore i.e. I understand the principles of OOP, inheritance, multithreading. In addition to the basic principles of java, I study android-development on the site fandroit.info, i.e. familiar with the process of creating android applications. There is a completed course on the basics of C++ at stepic.org from Yandex.\n\n

I am interested in self-education and personal effectiveness, looking for methods and means for pumping my mind, body and character, I am not ready to sit in one place without work, I will work in a company that needs active youth, I consider myself creative, support my body in a healthy and an alert state.\n\n
